summary:
Hands on experience in the whole software development life cycle. Experienced using different methodologies as Agile, TDD or RUP in software developing using languages as C++,Java, C#  or php. Linux/Unix expert, Android certified, hands on experience in designing, building, testing J2EE, mobile or desktop applications. Also strong data modelling skills. Entrepreneur, very result driven and no impossible tasks winning mentality. I am available for the next position in the project developing  as developer, architect or technical lead.  Also master in chess programming. Author of RelaxChess game , available in Microsoft store https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9NF45RD240HN

Android certification taken at EDUMobile.org
 
Specialization: software designing, software developing, software consultancy, software implementation, project leading

Here is a list of applications I have done working for my own
1) PizzaPlay - Written in Java later Android good for testing reflex game
2) Tetris - my version of Tetris game written in Java and Swing
3) EasyLearn - Game dedicated for small children to learn first words, written in Java
4) HouseKeper - Simplified house control using onWire framework. Written in Java and Swing
5) Drafts - Written in Java and Swing
6) Spilling checker - Checks online text when You type, measure also your type speed and number type mistakes .Wriiten in Java and Swing.
7) Circle and cross , written in Java and Swing (built in Usa airport waiting for a plane :-))
8) Presentation - Simple browser to watch photos. Written in Java
9) Chat with us, encrypted chat program, possible to send peer to peer (private) or public messages, written in html and Java 
10) GoldenEye - Android App. Guarding your house app. camera is used to watch your house during your absence. Java
11) RelaxChess 1 - built in Java and Swing.
12) RelaxChess 2 - built in Java and JavaFx
13) RelaxChess 3 - Android version
14) RelaxChess 4 - Built in Java and html/Javascript as Gui
15) RelaxChess 5 - Built for Android platform
16) RelaxChess 5+ - Built in Java and ReactJs framework as frontend
17) RelaxChess 6 - Written completly for .Net platform (WPF and C#)
18) RelaxChess 7 - Gui built in UWP technology (C#) and chess engine as dll in C++ language
19) QRelaxChess 8 - Built completely in C++ language. Gui using QT 5 framework.
20) PlanesAndCanons Sample shooting game. C++ and QT 5 
21) QRelaxChess 10 - Chess engine algorithms rewritten resulting in performance improvement and smarter moves. QT5 gui improved.
22) RelaxChess was also deployed in docker and in Google cloud eg.

profile_positions.description: Chess game GUI and engine improvements. Chess engine improvements are quite big. Engine is improved to the level of other best commercial engines. Extra functionality added to the GUI. The game currently can be called bugs free.
profile_positions.title: Developer and owner

profile_positions.description: Project consisted of extending Traffic Control System on Swedisch highway around Stockholm. System was built mostly in C++ code and communication layer using Mosquitto and RabbitMq frameworks. My task was there among other to port old part written in Java to C++code resulting in 5 times better performance.
profile_positions.title: Senior C++ developer

profile_positions.description: Building RelaxChess 7, chess engine written entirely in C++. Working on commercial and open source version of RelaxChess game. Based on views at some internet chess portals RelaxChess game is gaining more and more popularity. Building RelaxChess cloud version. It is set up on Google cloud and using spring boot framework. Designing and building new RelaxChess WEB interface using reactJS framework.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
Building RelaxChess 5, this is continuation of previous releases this time building in Microsoft .NET technology. Porting from Java to .Net chess engine software and improving it in .NET technology.
Building from scratch completely new User Interface (GUI)  in WPF and C# . Currently the latest version uses the latest UWP technology that can run in all devices running on Windows 10 platform. Development of this application was triggered by some important criteria as performance, user friendliness , look and feel and suggestions  from the chess forums. The target is not only to be one of the best chess games on the market but also use it as reference to find eventually a right job!.
Links 
RelaxChess5 Microsoft edition https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/relaxchess/9nf45rd240hn
RelaxChess5 Open source Java edition http://open-chess.org/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=3154
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description: Implementing ITIL methodology within a company.  Second and third line support on technical area , looking for the software improvements.  Setting up locally customer technical environment.  As technology lead advising other members on technical area.
profile_positions.title: Technology lead

profile_positions.description: 1)	Implementing new product in the existing Java Swing core application. The project consisted of making new user interfaces, integrating using web services , JMS with other applications and persisting data based on the built business rules.

profile_positions.description:
Designing and developing fully operational chess game originally known as RelaxChess (desktop version also developed by me) for mobile platform (android).
Desktop chess game available also in 3D version.
Porting of Java code to .NET technology.
Adding new features and functionality such as auto(chess learning) mode.
Building www.relaxchess.com portal. 
Setting up advertisment campagne at Google adWords and Microsoft Bing for latest versions of RelaxChess game.

company.name: Contractor at Behavioural Science Institute, Radboud University Nijmegen

profile_positions.company: Contractor at Behavioural Science Institute, Radboud University Nijmegen
profile_positions.description:
1) Designing and developing system components and architecture for interfacing african students web application with financial banking institutions at Radboud University. Architeture build using Spring interfacing classes and http protocol. As persistance layer the ibatis framework with Progress database is used.
2)  Designing and building software architecture to interface existing publication application at Radboud University with other publications Agencies all over the world. Architecture based on Xml/Dom and http protocol parsing incoming data into domain objects. Persistance framewerk based on ibatis and oracle database.
profile_positions.title: Sr. java developer / technical architect

profile_positions.description:
As a technical architect and the owner of the company Ryszard was involved in the whole phase of the projects. Working in the test driven environment Ryszard has designed and built software for the entertainment as well education sector. Built software is based on java 6 technology and was developed using Oracle Jdeveloper, Mysql as database engine and has a purpose to function as building blocks for the further development. Underneath a short description of built by Ryszard applications and used technologies
1) Multi user chess game configurable in as standalone or as client / server game. It has functionality to play against own written chess rules engine, play against other user, watching played games, saving games in chess pgn format as well replaying them on demand. Written using Swing, multi-threading and messages based architecture using client / server model. It is distributed as open source project and can be downloaded from www.sourceforge.net/projects/wowchess
2) Housekeeper application, which has a purpose remotely control some house electrical devices as lamps e.g. as well collect weather data. Using maxim-ic onewire, hibernate and jfreechart frameworks it has ability to read, register and graphically display current and history data.
3) Easywords application, simple educational application for children that could be used using learning writing. Written using Swing It uses freetts java speach synthesizer engine and mbrola framework for speach generation.
4) A few other java games as drafts or tetris built on Swing technology.  

Applications are currently tested and running on Knoppix Linux 6.2 and Microsoft Vista OS's.
profile_positions.title: Architect
